graphics2D
Class MapView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JScrollPane
                  graphics2D.MapView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants
public class MapView
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane

MapView provides a view of the map, by displaying its Tiles and Edges in a 2D fashion

Version:
1.0
Author:
Group D, Main Author: Darrell Penner Group D Members --------------- Karen Madore Trang Pham Darrell Penner
See Also:
Serialized Form

MapView

public MapView(Level l)
Takes a level, and initializes the view to display all edges and tiles in the level.

Parameters:
l - The level to initialize. If null, a blank view is created.

Checks if there is a Tile at the given offsetted location.

Parameters:

Returns:
True if there is a tile at the specified location, false otherwise.
